## Properties

| Property               | Attribute    | Description                                                                                               | Type            | Default     |
| ---------------------- | ------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------- | ----------- |
| `appLoaded`            | `app-loaded` | Global flag indicating if the whole application has loaded.  If not, this view should not display either. | `boolean`       | `false`     |
